title: why do i always get feeders and afkers on my team in ranked? but the other team is perfect?
body:
its not even that "you only remember your bad games bs" no. it literally happens every. single.  ranked game. i play..and i dont understand what i am doing to deserve this i try everything in my power to help my teammates out i roam, i help peel and leave them to get the kills when i can easily take if for myself, hell if im roaming and i see my teammate hasnt warded their bush ill even fuckin ward for them WHAT AM I DOING WRONG???????????
I just want to climb out of bronze but it feels like the system puts me with bad players to try to do everything in their power to keep me from archiving my goal

replies.body:
https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Negativity_bias

Not bashing on you I just use to feel the same way. But the othwr team probably faces their share of crap

It really is negativity bias. You remember when they're on your team but not when it happens to them. A quick glance at your match history proves that. 

Lets look at your last 5 ranked games as proof. 

Game 1: You and your mid laner fed. Your Yi jungle was positive.

Game 2: You fed, but your jungler and toplane ended positive. They weren't feeding. Their top and jungle this game did awful compared to yours. Their team wasn't perfect.

Game 3: Everyone on your team did well. **Your** team was the perfect one. Not the enemy team

Game 4:  You got carried by your 15/6 Jax. Their team had two feeders. You had a horrible build of BoTRK and Iceborn on Jhin

Game 5: Everyone on your team did poorly. +1 on your theory


So, out of those 5 games only once was the enemy team perfect and your team had feeders. Your statements don't make any sense if you look at your match history.

how can u see my ranked games history? link pls. 
and botrk and iceborn on jhin?????? i remember doing that for funnzies an a norms but i never did that in a ranked game are you sure?

Hells BellsX's match history http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/235298445

Basically you just type in the name on the player in the search box in upper right and it will give you the match history of anyone not just yourself.

holy i did go iceborn jhin in ranked lmao i had no idea that was ranked wtf
Brand on my team was 0/11 against Velkoz, Swain top fed pantheon. Not sure why people play new champs in ranked and feed for it
